meanings.sent2: He mispronounces his friend's name all the time.
meanings.sent3: The parrot mispronounces words in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: His accent sometimes mispronounces words like a broken record.
meanings.sent5: The teacher demonstrated how to mispronounce a word to the class.

meanings.definition: To utter or articulate (sounds or words) incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The singer mispronounces lyrics during the performance.
meanings.sent2: Children often mispronounce words as they learn to speak.
meanings.sent3: The robot mispronounces words in a robotic voice.
meanings.sent4: The wind mispronounces the howling sounds in the night.
meanings.sent5: The radio host accidentally mispronounced the guest's name on air.
